plot: During the build-up to D-Day in 1944, the British found their island hosting many thousands of American soldiers who were &"oversexed, overpaid, and over here&". That's Charlie Madison exactly; he knows all the angles to make life as smooth and risk-free as possible for himself. But things become complicated when he falls for an English woman, and his commanding officer's nervous breakdown leads to Charlie being sent on a senseless and dangerous mission.   Written by  Anonymous
title: La americanización de Emily
